intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What type of music do you listen to?
What is your favorite thing to do in nature?
What do you like to do at the park?
What do you like to eat?

respond_situations.description: You are in a clothing shop. A customer asks you.

respond_situations.starter_line: What would you like to drink?
What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. The waiter asks you.

ask_situations.instruction: You want to ask about a school trip. You ask your teacher. ..
You are at the store. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a toy.
You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.

listening_script.text: I like to choose my clothes. I wear a blue shirt. I wear black pants. I like red shoes. It is sunny today.

questions.question: How many pants do I wear?

monologue.topic: Talk about your favourite TV show

follow_up_questions.question: What is the name of your favorite TV show?
When do you watch this show?
Who is your favorite character in the show?
Why do you like this show?
